wellness-demo.name: Aura Vitality

audience.primary: Health-conscious millennials seeking natural and effective ways to enhance their well-being and performance. They are informed and proactive about their health.
audience.aspiration: To live a longer, healthier, more fulfilling life, optimized for peak performance and balanced well-being.

visual.aesthetic: Clean, minimal, organic, modern, and sophisticated.

colors.accent: #52796F - Forest green, represents nature and vitality

photography.style: Lifestyle and product-focused, with an emphasis on natural light and authentic moments.
photography.lighting: Soft, natural light with gentle shadows, occasionally utilizing soft studio lighting for product shots.
photography.composition: Clean, balanced compositions using the rule of thirds and negative space, close-ups highlighting texture and detail.
subjects: Millennial individuals practicing wellness activities (yoga, meditation, cooking)
Product in use within a clean, modern environment

ugc_guidelines.authenticity_level: Balanced: Leans towards polished, but still feels genuine.
creator_types: Everyday users with a focus on healthy living
scenarios: Morning routine with Aura Vitality supplement
Adding supplement to smoothie or beverage
no_go: Excessive branding or promotion beyond natural product placement

key_features: Easy to incorporate into daily routine
Targeted health benefits (e.g., energy, focus, sleep)
differentiators: Emphasis on natural ingredients and sustainable practices

wellness-demo.vision: Premium wellness supplement brand targeting health-conscious millennials. Clean, minimal aesthetic with earth tones. Products are organic, science-backed. Customers aspire to optimize their health and performance. Think Ritual meets Athletic Greens.
